item.title: D3.js in Jekyll Markdown
item.description:
I’ve used d3.select to target an element <div id="example"> in this document:
Things to keep in mind:
Include morley.csv (Search local JavaScript for /morley.csv) Include D3.js Include box.js Include the local CSS and JavaScript
Check out the code for this post on GitHub.
